changeLog.title: Feature Release: Clusters
changeLog.subtext: With clusters, you can now monitor and take actions in your focus areas filtered on multiple metrics.

changeLog.title: Locale is Now 100x Faster & comes with a New and Improved UI
changeLog.subtext: We at Locale are thrilled to announce a major product update. Our product is now 100x faster than it used to be. You heard it right: 100x FASTER!!!
